title: Frequently Asked Questions
description: Find answers to common questions about Tater Client.

questions.question: How do I install TClient?
questions.answer: Download the client folder for your operating system, extract the files, and click the DDNet executable in the folder.

questions.question: Will my settings transfer from vanilla DDNet?
Install via Launcher
questions.answer: You can install TClient via the TWLauncher by selecting the TClient in the launcher. This will automatically download the latest version of client for you.

questions.question: What settings should I use for gores?
questions.answer: Enable "Fast Input" optionally with "Fast Input Others", and "Remove Prediction & antiping in freeze" (Amount:100ms, Delay: 500ms). You can try the improved anti ping smoothing and other settings if you want them.

questions.question: What settings should I use for ddrace?
questions.answer: You can try "Fast Input" with "Fast Input Others" and the improved antiping smoothing, these settings are personal preference.

questions.question: Client doesn't launch from steam
questions.answer: Try using TWLauncher instead, if that doesn't work, report a bug in the Discord server or GitHub issues page.

questions.question: How do I report a bug?
questions.answer: Report bugs on the GitHub issues page or Discord server. Please include steps to reproduce the issue.
